item.description:
Our next meeting is on Tuesday, November 23, at 7 PM in the Lounge in the SENIOR CENTER on 49 Pleasant Street off READING SQUARE.

We will be having an open forum with no particular topic to discuss unless someone wishes to present one. Come with your suggestions, concerns and comments. We will be here to support each other and to help everyone achieve a new level of health.

E-mail me at btzee6@gmail.com if you want to present any findings or interesting information at the meeting.

To schedule a Myotherapy or Fibromyalgia education session call me at 623-251-7547 or 617-943-5570.

Betsy

Donations for meetup expenses and room rental are always gratefully accepted.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the briefcase and all the papers in front of me.
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia Recovery Meetup
